text: FC Zakarpattia-2 Uzhhorod is a Ukrainian football team based in Uzhhorod, Ukraine. The club has been featured regularly in the Ukrainian Second Division it serves as a junior team for the FC Zakarpattia Uzhhorod franchise. Like most tributary teams, the best players are sent up to the senior team, meanwhile developing other players for further call-ups. Zakarpattia-2 Uzhhorod Category:2001 establishments in Ukraine Zakarpattia-2 Uzhhorod
title: FC Zakarpattia-2 Uzhhorod
